hero.title: Yachts
hero.description: ATM JET Yachts is proud to offer the largest fleet of superyachts for sale over 20 metres worldwide.
hero.description2: Our extensive network of owners and shipyards allows us to access thousands of additional yachts, including those not publicly listed for sale.

carousel.title: Weâ€™ll find you the perfect one
carousel.description: We will conduct an introductory meeting to assist you in defining the most crucial parameters.

card1.title: Top yacht architecture bureaus
card1.description: Know talented designers and architects who can create yachts that are works of art.

card2.title: Length required
card2.description: Will assess your expectations of comfort, planned number of guests, and required crew.

card3.title: Price
card3.description: Includes transaction cost, cost of ownership, and amortisation

card4.title: Yield
card4.description: Yachts offer excellent returns when managed by experienced professionals. We will create a financial model for you.

descriptor.title: We buy yachts for our clients as well as for ourselves.

card1.title: Hull
card1.description: Inspection of the hull, deck, set, cabins and bulkheads, assessing for geometric changes and internal moisture.

card2.title: Engine
card2.description: Engine, engine compartment inspection, Computer diagnostics

card3.title: Electronics
card3.description: Electrical systems, drains, taps, computers and navigation systems.

card5.title: Thermal imaging inspection
card5.description: Hull structure integrity, engine thermal inspection, electric

card1.title: Legal department
card1.description: The legal department is committed to ensuring that the transaction is completely secure from start to finish. We will prepare the following:
card1.list:
Letter of intent with guarantees and undertakings 
Verification of the yacht's bank lien 
Sale and Purchase Agreement 
Change of ownership in the decision to register the yacht 
Registration of the yacht under a flag of convenience 
Other documents required

card2.title: Finance department
card2.description: The finance department will select the most appropriate option from the following:
card2.list:
Select the most advantageous tax jurisdiction for the transaction. 
Select the most suitable insurance. 
Project the cost of ownership. 
Calculate the projected rental income. 
Number and cost of crew required

why_us.title: Over 20 years of successful yacht management
why_us.description: We will negotiate on your behalf to secure the most favorable terms.
why_us.subtitle: For every yacht in our management we create:

card2.title: Yearly marketing plan
card2.description: Online/offline marketing strategy for the year.

card3.title: Top database listings
card3.description: All of our managed yachts in key databases, portals and MLS systems with only the top brokerage firms as members such as; Yachtfolio, Boat International, Superyachts.com, Charter Index, etc.

card4.title: Luxury event partnerships
card4.description: We partner with luxury and charity events.

contact_us.title: Contact us
contact_us.description: Contact us for a personalized consultation online or on one of our yachts around the world.
